author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
This adds a new hook for customizing L1Reco to unpack stage 1 from RAW.  It requires a customization like:

```
from L1Trigger.L1TCommon.customsPostLS1 import customiseL1RecoForStage1
customiseL1RecoForStage1(process)
```

in order to have any effect.

(It requires more testing)
title: add l1reco hook for stage1
